events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately as this has caused me inconvenience.
Case tagged under Refund cluster after review of customer's message describing wrong item received and refund request.
Support agent John Doe has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect item delivery.
Hello, I’m John from customer support. I’m here to help you with the refund process for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and here is the photo of the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days and arrange for the wrong item to be returned at no cost.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt response and for handling this so smoothly.
The refund has been initiated successfully, and return instructions have been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Closing this case as the refund was confirmed received and no further issues were reported. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey via email; we appreciate your time in helping us improve our service.
